for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    (p, q) = ([], [])
    flag = True
    for i in arr:
        if flag:
            p.append(i)
        else:
            q.append(i)
        flag ^= True
    p1 = len(p)
    q1 = len(q)
    ans = abs(p[(p1 + 1) // 2 - 1] - q[(q1 + 1) // 2 - 1])
    print(ans)

import math

def main():
    t = int(input())
    while t > 0:
        n = int(input())
        A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        A.sort()
        l1 = []
        l2 = []
        for i in range(len(A)):
            if i % 2 == 0:
                l1.append(A[i])
            else:
                l2.append(A[i])
        print(abs(l1[(len(l1) + 1) // 2 - 1] - l2[(len(l2) + 1) // 2 - 1]))
        t -= 1
main()

t = int(input())
for test in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    l1 = []
    l2 = []
    c1 = 0
    c2 = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if i % 2 == 0:
            l1.append(l[i])
            c1 += 1
        else:
            l2.append(l[i])
            c2 += 1
    a = (c1 - 1) // 2
    b = (c2 - 1) // 2
    print(abs(l1[a] - l2[b]))
